column1: Bollox is easy to learn as there are only two rules. Playing the game of Bollox, well, is a bit trickier.<br/><br/>Your objective? Get five pieces in a row. Sounds easy, right?<br/><br/>Rule One: Black plays first. Still sounds easy? Not so fast!<br/><br/>Rule Two: The seemingly sudden 'Sandwich Move'. Just like it sounds, when you entrap two of your opponent's pieces between two of your own, you get to "evict" one of your opponent's pieces. ...
Category: Combinatorial, Category: n in a row, Components: Marbles, Misc: Mensa Select, Players: Two-Player Only Games
